body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Adam Hall. May I know your name, please?

Yeah, this is Emily Watson. And I'm not happy right now.

I’m sorry to hear that you’re upset, Emily. Could you please tell me what's going on so I can assist you better?

I ordered a keyboard and it hasn't arrived yet. It's been over two weeks!

I apologize for the delay, Emily. Let me check that for you. Could I please have your order number?

Sure, it's one two three four five.

Thank you, Emily. And to verify your identity, could you provide your shipping address?

It's one two three Music Lane, Harmony Town, ZIP code one zero zero zero one.

Got it, Emily. It looks like there was a delay with the shipment. I assure you, it will be delivered by the end of this week.

Fine. It better be. This has been really frustrating.

I understand your frustration, Emily, and I apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your patience and for reaching out to us. Have a great day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Adam Hall from a random business discusses shipping with Emily Watson. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Adam Hall. May I know your name, please?

Yeah, this is Emily Watson. And I'm not happy right now.

I’m sorry to hear that you’re upset, Emily. Could you please tell me what's going on so I can assist you better?

I ordered a keyboard and it hasn't arrived yet. It's been over two weeks!

I apologize for the delay, Emily. Let me check that for you. Could I please have your order number?

Sure, it's one two three four five.

Thank you, Emily. And to verify your identity, could you provide your shipping address?

It's one two three Music Lane, Harmony Town, ZIP code one zero zero zero one.

Got it, Emily. It looks like there was a delay with the shipment. I assure you, it will be delivered by the end of this week.

Fine. It better be. This has been really frustrating.

I understand your frustration, Emily, and I apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your patience and for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
